complexParameter.name: script
script
script
complexParameter.core:text:
def SHEET = 'QuietArea'
_snippets.end_Checks { registerType(SHEET)
integerCheck('FT3', 'FC2', SHEET, 'id') existsCheck('FC5', SHEET, 'quietAreaId_identifier') codelistCheck('TC7', null, SHEET, 'quietAreaName_localNameLanguage', CODELIST_LanguageTypeValue()) existsCheck('FC10', SHEET, 'quietAreaType')
existsCheck('FC18', SHEET, 'inspireId_localId') existsCheck('FC20', SHEET, 'inspireId_namespace') existsCheck('FC70', SHEET, 'protectionMeasure')
codelistCheck('TC24', 'FC23', SHEET, 'specialisedZoneType', CODELIST_SpecialisedZoneTypeValue()) codelistCheck('TC44', null, SHEET, 'protectionFrom', CODELIST_NoiseSourceValue_All())
uniqueCheck('TU55', SHEET, 'quietAreaId_identifier') uniqueCheck('TU69', SHEET, ['inspireId_localId', 'inspireId_namespace'])
existsCheck('FC97', SHEET, 'geometry')
}
withTransformationContext{ def c = _.context.collector(it) c.quietAreaId_identifier << _source.p.quietAreaId_identifier.value() }

complexParameter.name: script
